full_text:
Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
From Hugh Hurwitz
To Ray Ormond
Date 2019/08/11 09:45
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Great. I'll call at noon and have ray on the line.
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: (OAG) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 8/11/19 9:40 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz @bop.gov>
Cc: Ray Ormond @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
>>> (OAG) 08/11/2019 09:40 >>>
Ok. Let's check in at noon. You can call my cell or send a call in number for the three of use. Either way works
508.951
On Aug 11, 2019, at 9:31 AM, Hugh Hurwitz @bop.gov> wrote:
Sure. Noon is fine, nothing pressing but we can talk anytime you want.
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: (OAG) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 8/11/19 9:29 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz @bop.gov>
Cc: Ray Ormond @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing a Reuters article about prison guards skipping mandatory checks before Epstein's death. The emails are redacted, with names and email addresses obscured.
